Title: 9 arrested, accused in smash-and-grab jewelry heist at Fort Worth grocery, police say
Excerpt: Fort Worth Police said nine people including a 16-year-old, were arrested in connection to a smash-and-grab last Sunday. Detectives from other cities are investigating if the group is connected to similar crimes in Dallas and Houston.

Title: Police arrest nine people in connection with smash-and-grab robbery
Excerpt: Police say nine people, including a juvenile, were arrested in connection with a smash-and-grab robbery inside a Fort Worth grocery store. NBC 5’s Sophia Beausoleil reports investigators want to know if they group are tied to similar crimes across North Texas and Houston.
